content.query:
/*
select BirthDate from Patients

SELECT Id AS [rows]
FROM OPENROWSET( 
    BULK '/**', 
    DATA_SOURCE = 'Silver',
    FORMAT='delta' ) patients

SELECT
nyc.filename() AS [filename],COUNT_BIG(*) AS [rows]
FROM
OPENROWSET(
    BULK 'parquet/taxi/year=2017/month=9/*.parquet',
    DATA_SOURCE = 'SqlOnDemandDemo',
    FORMAT='PARQUET'
) nyc
GROUP BY nyc.filename()
*/
